title: LF +1 or group
body:
Hey,

I've just recently come back to league, looking for someone/some people to play normals with. I'm a pretty laid back person. Lmk if anyone is keen to play

Shiney ~

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
hey man remember the good ol days where we duo'd and hard climbed!
yeah!
woo!

Hey, i'll play with you. 
Im not terrible i swear.

Yea bro.. im only available on weekends but i own a discord server that has friendly league players 
https://discord.gg/9vMT2DD
we rarely ever flex.. so we r just teh casual group ur looking for ;)
